Food Reviews

Concise Reviews

  • Futago
    Delicious meat. Horrible ramen. Enjoyable avocado. Priced too aggressively. Great customer service.
  • Go Go Curry
    Go if indecisive the next meal.
  • Ippudo
    Overhyped
  • Kobeyaki
    Okay meat. Boring in general. Fast food.
  • Menkui Tei
    Ramen and beer combination that hits the right spot.
  • Meson Sevilla
    Good paellas. Good atmosphere.
  • Peter Luger
    Just a regular steak. Otherworldly bacon. Enjoyable environment.
  • Totto Ramen
    Over-hyped. Delicious buns.
